body_html:
use Tensorflow for Image detection and classification;
For a single image ,However small is it , the sess.run() method cost above 10ms
But a batch(batch num = 100) input, the sess.run() cost less than 200ms, 2ms per image
Why? Can I improve the efficiency for single Image input??
